title: The credit fees payment form for the second  semester of 2023 academic year can be downloaded from the web-site of Bank of Taiwan from March 28!
author: 鄧瑞美
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 總務處出納組 - 鄧瑞美 - deng@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話03-8906366
對象： 全校學生
標題： The credit fees payment form for the second  semester of 2023 academic year can be downloaded from the web-site of Bank of Taiwan from March 28!
日期： Wed, 27 Mar 2024 16:11:55 +0800

Dear students
Reminder: Students can download credit fees payment form for the second semester of 2023 academic year from the website of the Bank of Taiwan (https://school.bot.com.tw/twbank.net/).

The credit fees for the second semester of 2023 academic year can be paid from March 28 to April 12, 2024.
If you have questions regarding course selection, please contact Ms. Ta in Curriculum Division of Academic Affairs Office at 03-8906123.
 If you have question regarding payment, please contact Ms. Deng in Cashier Disivion of General Affairs Office at 03-8906366.
	


Best regards,
The Cashier Section of the Office of General Affairs
